title: Chicago’s Apocalypse Is a No-Snow
sub_head: The ‘once in a lifetime’ blizzard, supposedly a portent of global warming, delivered but a few inches.
body:
Chicago
A snowstorm used to be just a snowstorm. Not anymore. Now that climate change has seized the imagination of TV news producers, the mere threat of a blizzard is an apocalyptic science-affirming catastrophe, a terror-rife golden opportunity not to be frittered away.
